title: The next time you release URF...
body:
Please allow us to pick our champs and give us ten bans.

I do love the random aspect of it, but I am sick of seeing Fizz, Hecarim, Sona, Shaco, Eve, Maokai, and Blitzcrank every game whereas I get trash champs like Ashe, Anivia (only good to troll your team and lock them in the fountain), and other champs I forget the names of.

I mean, it may be called All Random, but, like ARAM, you see the same champs every game.

Thank you bless xx
